prompt:
✅ Project: MedLink – Affordable Medicine Finder

Frontend: React.js
Backend: Node.js (or Golang/NestJS — whichever you prefer)


---

🌟 Minimal Viable Features (Enough for Resume + Interview):

🔍 Search bar to find medicine names

💰 Show price for the medicine

💊 Show 2–3 cheaper alternatives (mock data or static JSON is fine)

📍 List nearby pharmacies (even hardcoded or from dummy API)

👤 Basic login/register with JWT
name: App
